#3.6
Set Up Your Files
Use the "Admin" menu to load a file into the Static Analyzer using Parser mode.
Go to the Admin  menu and choose "Edit Fileset..."
Under the "Scanner Fileset" column, select the file that you want parsed

Click on up arrow to transfer file to Parser Fileset and click "ok".


Sorry.  Please click on the "Edit Fileset..." from the "Admin" menu.

Force Scan
Change Fileset...
Edit FileSet...

Set Include Path
Results Filter...
Edit Selected Item
